support.title: Support
support.main_text:
Even a 30 cent donation helps us with updates and says thank you.

We improved your life ‚Äî made it faster, more fun, more efficient. All your thoughts are recorded correctly and in full.

We don't collect statistics, don't ask for 20 bucks like other programs. Even 30 cents helps us not die of hunger!
support.secondary_text:
Please don't think that others will donate or someone richer will help.

Everyone thinks so, and in the end no one helps.

We saved you at least 20 bucks a month. With Groq you can convert 1.5+ hours of audio per day for free, with post-processing and formatting ‚Äî that's 3 hours a day.

With other services it would be 100 bucks. Be kinder!

ai_provider.title: AI Provider
ai_provider.label: Provider:
ai_provider.custom_key_tooltip: API key for custom OpenAI-compatible API
ai_provider.custom_url_tooltip: URL endpoint for custom API (e.g., LM Studio, Ollama)
ai_provider.custom_model_tooltip: Custom model name for transcription (optional). If specified, this model will be used instead of the default for the selected provider (Groq, OpenAI, GLM, or Custom).
ai_provider.transcription_custom_model_tooltip: Enter custom model name if not using default (optional). If specified, this model will be used instead of the default for this provider.
ai_provider.info:
üí° Tip: Groq provides free and fast API.
Recommended for getting started.

Get API keys:
‚Ä¢ Groq: console.groq.com/keys
‚Ä¢ OpenAI: platform.openai.com/api-keys
‚Ä¢ GLM: open.bigmodel.cn/usercenter/apikeys

Custom provider:
Supports any OpenAI-compatible API:
‚Ä¢ LM Studio: lmstudio.ai
‚Ä¢ Ollama: ollama.ai
‚Ä¢ vLLM, LocalAI and others

app.title: Application
app.hotkey_tooltip: Press key combination to record (e.g.: Ctrl+Space, F1, Ctrl+Shift+R)
app.format_hotkey_tooltip: Press key combination to open format selection dialog (e.g.: Ctrl+Alt+Space)
app.remember_position_tooltip: If enabled, recording window will appear where you dragged it
app.window_position_tooltip: Choose where recording window will appear
app.manual_format_hotkey_tooltip: Press key combination to open manual formatting dialog (e.g.: Ctrl+Shift+Space)

audio.title: Audio
audio.manual_stop_tooltip:
If enabled:
‚Ä¢ Recording does NOT stop automatically on silence
‚Ä¢ You stop recording yourself by pressing hotkey again
‚Ä¢ All silence is automatically removed before sending
audio.manual_stop_info: üí° Manual stop: Recording continues even during silence. Stop recording yourself by pressing hotkey again. All silence will be automatically removed.
audio.silence_duration_tooltip: Seconds of silence before stopping recording (0.5-5.0)
audio.silence_padding_tooltip:
Padding in milliseconds before and after sound when removing silence.
Prevents cutting off mid-word. (100-1000 ms)
audio.warning:
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Changing audio parameters may affect recording quality.
Recommended to keep default values.

formatting.title: Formatting
formatting.enable_tooltip: Automatically format text depending on active application
formatting.use_fixed_format_tooltip:
If enabled, always use universal prompt regardless of active application.
Useful if you want the same formatting for all applications.
formatting.info: Automatically formats transcribed text depending on active application. Supports Notion, Obsidian, Markdown files, Word, LibreOffice and others.

processing.title: Processing
processing.enable_tooltip:
After transcription, text will be sent for additional processing
to fix errors, add punctuation and improve readability
processing.combine_with_formatting_tooltip:
When enabled, post-processing and formatting run in one request.
When disabled, they run in two steps: post-processing then formatting.
processing.info:
üí° What post-processing does:
‚Ä¢ Fixes grammatical errors
‚Ä¢ Adds punctuation
‚Ä¢ Improves text structure
‚Ä¢ Preserves meaning and content

‚úÖ Groq - free and fast (recommended)
‚ö†Ô∏è OpenAI - paid, high quality
‚ö†Ô∏è GLM - regular API (requires balance) or Coding Plan
üñ•Ô∏è LLM - local models (LM Studio, Ollama, etc.)
processing.provider_tooltip:
AI provider for text processing

üí° Groq - free and fast (recommended)
‚ö†Ô∏è OpenAI - paid, high quality
‚ö†Ô∏è GLM - regular API or Coding Plan (checkbox below)
üñ•Ô∏è LLM - local models (LM Studio, Ollama)
processing.glm_coding_plan_tooltip:
If you have GLM Coding Plan subscription,
enable this option to use special endpoint
with access to glm-4.5, glm-4.6, glm-4.7 models
processing.llm_base_url_tooltip: Local LLM server URL (e.g., LM Studio, Ollama)
processing.llm_api_key_tooltip: API key for local LLM (usually not required, can leave 'local')
processing.custom_model_tooltip: Enter custom model name if not in list above (optional). If specified, this model will be used instead of the dropdown selection.
processing.prompt_tooltip: Instructions for model on text processing
processing.prompt_placeholder: Enter system prompt for text processing...
processing.prompt_default: You are a text editor. Your task: fix grammatical errors, add punctuation and improve text readability. Preserve the original meaning and style. Don't add anything extra. Return only the corrected text without comments.

hooks.title: Hooks
hooks.enable_tooltip: Enable Python hook scripts during processing
hooks.info: Hooks allow running custom Python scripts at each pipeline step.

languages.title: Languages
languages.info:
üí° Interface language:
Choose language for future interface localization.
This does NOT affect transcription language - you can speak any language.
languages.future_info:
üöß In development:
‚Ä¢ Interface translation to selected language
‚Ä¢ Localization of all texts and messages
‚Ä¢ Date and time format adaptation

recordings.title: Recordings
recordings.keep_recordings_tooltip: If enabled, audio recordings will be saved to recordings folder
recordings.change_folder_tooltip: Choose another folder for saving recordings
recordings.play_audio_tooltip: Open selected audio recording in default player
recordings.delete_confirm_message:
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?

{filename}
recordings.change_folder_success_message:
Recordings folder changed to:
{folder}

New recordings will be saved to:
‚Ä¢ {folder}/audio/
‚Ä¢ {folder}/transcriptions/

ui_customization.title: UI Customization
ui_customization.font_floating_main_tooltip: Font size for main text in recording window (10-24px)
ui_customization.font_floating_info_tooltip: Font size for info panel text (8-16px)
ui_customization.font_settings_labels_tooltip: Font size for labels in settings (10-16px)
ui_customization.reset_defaults_tooltip: Reset all UI customization settings to default values

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.no_data: No data available for this period

about.title: About
about.description:
Fast speech transcription from microphone
using AI API (Groq, OpenAI, GLM, Custom)
about.links:
Links:
‚Ä¢ GitHub: {github_url}
‚Ä¢ Documentation: docs/
‚Ä¢ Support: Create issue
about.libraries_main:
Main:
‚Ä¢ PyQt6 - GUI framework
‚Ä¢ OpenAI Python SDK - API client
‚Ä¢ PyAudio - Audio recording
‚Ä¢ NumPy - Audio processing
‚Ä¢ Keyboard - Hotkeys
‚Ä¢ Pyperclip - Clipboard
‚Ä¢ Psutil - Process management
‚Ä¢ Python-dotenv - Configuration

Testing:
‚Ä¢ Pytest - Testing framework
‚Ä¢ Hypothesis - Property-based testing
about.providers_list:
Cloud:
‚Ä¢ Groq - Free and fast (recommended)
‚Ä¢ OpenAI - Official Whisper API
‚Ä¢ GLM (Zhipu AI) - Chinese support

Local (Custom):
‚Ä¢ LM Studio - Easy local model running
‚Ä¢ Ollama - CLI for local models
‚Ä¢ vLLM - High-performance inference
‚Ä¢ LocalAI - Local OpenAI alternative
‚Ä¢ Any OpenAI-compatible APIs

errors.save_settings_success:
Settings saved and applied!

New settings are now active.
errors.already_running_message:
RapidWhisper is already running!

Check the system tray icon.
If the application is not responding, terminate the process via Task Manager.
errors.api_authentication: Authentication error for {provider}. Check API key in settings.
errors.api_network: Network error for {provider}. Check internet connection.
errors.api_rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded for {provider}. Wait or change provider.
errors.model_not_found: Model '{model}' not found for {provider}. Check model name in settings.
errors.invalid_api_key: API key not found for {provider}. Check settings.
errors.hotkey_conflict: Failed to register hotkey {hotkey}. Try another.
errors.custom_provider_missing_params: Custom provider requires base_url and model
errors.config_validation_error: Configuration validation errors. Check config.jsonc and secrets.json
errors.app_not_initialized: Application not initialized. Call initialize() first.

notification.no_api_key_message:
API key is required for the application to work.

Please open Settings and configure your API key.
notification.settings_error_message: Some settings are incorrect. Check the logs.
notification.hotkey_error_message: Failed to register hotkey {new_hotkey}. Using old one: {old_hotkey}
notification.prompt_saved_message: Prompt for '{app}' saved and applied without restart!
notification.model_not_found_message:
Model '{model}' not found for {provider}.

Check model name in post-processing settings.
Available models can be found in the dropdown list.
notification.transcription_model_not_found_message:
Transcription model '{model}' not found for {provider}.

Check model name in AI Provider settings.
Using default model for this provider.
notification.api_rate_limit_message:
Rate limit exceeded for {provider}.

Wait {wait_time} or change model/provider in settings.
notification.api_authentication_message:
Authentication error for {provider}.

Check API key in settings.
notification.api_connection_message:
Failed to connect to {provider}.

Check internet connection.
notification.welcome_message:
To get started, you need to set up an API key.

Click on the tray icon to open Settings.
notification.welcome_dialog_text:
Welcome to RapidWhisper!

To get started, you need to set up an API key.
notification.welcome_dialog_info:
Where to get API keys:

‚Ä¢ Groq (recommended - free and fast):
console.groq.com/keys

‚Ä¢ OpenAI:
platform.openai.com/api-keys

‚Ä¢ GLM:
open.bigmodel.cn/usercenter/apikeys

‚Ä¢ ZAI:
zai.chat

After getting the key, open Settings and add it.

tray.about_text:
RapidWhisper v1.0

Fast speech transcription from microphone
using AI API (Groq, OpenAI, GLM).

Hotkey: Ctrl+Space
Cancel recording: ESC

¬© 2026 RapidWhisper
